lead_paragraph: Geraint Thomas won the E3 Harelbeke classic in Belgium with a late attack, while the three-time winner Fabian Cancellara sustained two minor fractures to his lower back after being caught in a crash.
snippet: Geraint Thomas won the E3 Harelbeke classic in Belgium with a late attack, while the three-time winner Fabian Cancellara sustained two minor fractures to his lower back after being caught in a crash.
